docs.text: 张宇翔 个人信息 姓名：张宇翔 职称：教授 邮箱：yxzhang@cauc.edu.cn 研究领域 数据分析与处理 民航信息化 教育背景 工学博士：信息网络与安全，北京交通大学，2011 讲授课程 本科生： * 算法与数据结构 硕士研究生： * 算法设计与分析 * 社会网络计算及推荐技术 个人简介   主要从事数据(包括文本、网络和民航)的分析与应用、民航信息化。先后访学清华大学信息网络工程研究中心(2013.09-2014.07)和新加坡国立通信资讯研究院(I2R)(2014.09-2015.02)。目前与南开大学合作在研一项国家自然科学基金项目、一项天津市教委科研计划重点项目。以第一作者或通讯作者在中文一级学报“软件学报”、“计算机学报”等，国际学术会议 SIGIR、ACL、IJCAI、CIKM、ECML/PKDD 等，国际SCI源期刊 Applied Soft Computing、Knowledge and Information Systems 等发表论文多篇。此外，近年来，与我院其他老师在民航企业信息化建设规划方面做了一些非常具体的有成效的工作，作为主持人和主要参加者先后承担了“首都机场动力能源有限公司信息系统规划”、“首都机场动力能源有限公司运控中心建设可行性研究方案”、“重庆机场信息系统规划”以及“广州白云机场股份公司信息系统规划”。 研究课题(近五年) 国家自然科学基金民航联合基金: 大数据下机场旅客动态服务需求捕捉与个性化服务推荐关键技术(2016.01-2019.12). 国家自然科学基金民航联合基金: 基于民航事件的乘客多模态情绪感知与分析(2020.01-2022.12). 天津市教委科研计划重点项目, 提取与生成融合的关键词预测算法研究(2021ZD002), 2021.12-2023.12. 学术成果(代表作) 会议论文 [1] Yuxiang Zhang, Tao Jiang, Tianyu Yang, XiaoLi Li, Suge Wang. HTKG: Deep Keyphrase Generation with Neural Hierarchical Topic Guidance. 45th SIGIR, 2022. (CCF-A) [2] Yuxiang Zhang, Tianyu Yang, Tao Jiang, XiaoLi Li, Suge Wang. Hyperbolic Deep Keyphrase Generation. ECML/PKDD, 2022. (CCF-B) [3] Zhang Yuxiang, Liu Huan, Shi Bei, Li Xiaoli, Wang Suge. WEKE: Learning Word Embeddings for Keyphrase Extraction. 4th APWeb-WAIM, 245-260, 2020. (CCF-C) [4] Zhou Tao, Zhang Yuxiang*, Zhu Haoxiang. Multi-level Memory Network with CRFs for Keyphrase Extraction. 24th PAKDD, 726-738, 2020. (CCF-C) [5] Zhao Jin, Zhang Yuxiang*. Incorporating Linguistic Constraints into Keyphrase Generation. 57th ACL, 5224–5233, 2019. (CCF-A) [6] Zhang Yuxiang, Fu Jiamei, She Dongyu, Zhang Ying, Wang Senzhang, Yang Jufeng. Text emotion distribution learning via multi-task convolutional neural network. 27th IJCAI, 4595-4601, 2018. (CCF-A) [7] Zhang Yuxiang, Chang Yaocheng, Liu Xiaoqing, Gollapalli Sujatha Das, Li Xiaoli, Xiao Chunjing. MIKE: Keyphrase extraction by integrating multidimensional information. 26th CIKM, 1349-1358, 2017. (CCF-B) [8] Zhang Yuxiang, Wang Lulu, Li Xiaoli, Xiao Chunjing. Social identity link across incomplete social information sources using anchor link expansion. 20th PAKDD, 359-408, 2016. (CCF-C) 期刊论文 [1] Fan Wei, Zhu Yuexuan, Wei Ziyun, Yang Tianyu, Ip W. H., Zhang Yuxiang*. Order-guided deep neural network for emotion-cause pair prediction. Applied Soft Computing, 2021, 112, 107818. [2] Lijuan Wang, Wenya Guo, Xingxu Yao, Yuxiang Zhang, Jufeng Yang. Multimodal event-aware network for sentiment analysis in tourism. IEEE Multimedia, 2021, 28(2): 49-58. [3] Zhang Yuxiang, Liu Huan, Wang Suge, Ip W.H., Fan Wei, Xiao Chunjing. Automatic keyphrase extraction using word embeddings. Soft Computing, 2020, 24, 5593–5608. (CCF-C) [4] Zhang Yuxiang, Fu Jiamei, Yang Chengyi, Xiao Chunjing. A local expansion propagation algorithm for social link identification. Knowledge and Information Systems, 2019, 60(1), 545-568. (CCF-B) [5] 常耀成, 张宇翔*, 王红, 万怀宇, 肖春景. 特征驱动的关键词提取算法综述. 软件学报, 2018, 29(7): 2046-2070. (入选《软件学报》2020高影响力论文) [6] 张宇翔，张宏科. 一种层次结构化P2P网络中的负载均衡方法. 计算机学报, 2010, 33(9):1580-1590. [7] Zhang Yuxiang, Luo Hongbin, Zhang Hongke. Load Balancing for a two-tier Chord System. IET Electronics Letters, 2010, 46(10):685-686. [8] 张宇翔, 杨冬, 张宏科. P2P网络中的Churn问题. 软件学报, 2009, 20(5):1362-1376. 奖励与荣誉 指导的傅佳美硕士论文《基于深度学习的多模态情感分析》获2020-2021年度天津市工程专业学位优秀学位论文 2009年被评为中国民航大学青年骨干教师，2012年考核为优秀青年骨干教师 指导学生参加全国大学生数学建模竞赛：国家一等奖(2005：赵东悦、龚晓洁、田园丽)，国家二等奖(2008：亓玉娇、李扬、吴伟伟；2019：吕紫薇、文淦、孙骏) 指导学生参加美国大学生数学建模竞赛：Meritorious Winner(2006：胡媛彦、刘博、杜美香)
docs.title: 关于我

docs.text: YuXiang Zhang person Information Name：YuXiang Zhang Title: Professor Mail：yxzhang@cauc.edu.cn Research Field Data analysis and processing Civil aviation informatization Education Background ph.D of Engineering: Information Network and Security, Beijing Jiaotong University, 2011 Lectures Undergraduate: Algorithms and Data Structures Postgraduate: Algorithm Design and Analysis Social Network Computing and Recommendation Technology Brief Introduction   Mainly engaged in data (including text, network and civil aviation) analysis and application, civil aviation informatization. He successively visited the Information Network Engineering Research Center of Tsinghua University (2013.09-2014.07) and the National Institute of Communications and Information (I2R) of Singapore (2014.09-2015.02). At present, in cooperation with Nankai University, a National Natural Science Foundation of China project and a key project of the Tianjin Municipal Education Commission's scientific research plan are being researched. As the first author or corresponding author in Chinese first-level journals "Journal of Software", "Journal of Computer", etc., international academic conferences SIGIR, ACL, IJCAI, CIKM, ECML/PKDD , etc., international SCI source journals Applied Soft Computing, Knowledge and Information Systems have published many papers. In addition, in recent years, I have done some very specific and effective work with other teachers in our college in the planning of civil aviation enterprise informatization construction. , "Capital Airport Power Energy Co., Ltd. Operation and Control Center Construction Feasibility Study Plan", "Chongqing Airport Information System Planning" and "Guangzhou Baiyun Airport Co., Ltd. Information System Planning". Research topic (last five years) National Natural Science Foundation of China Civil Aviation Joint Fund: Key technologies for airport passenger dynamic service demand capture and personalized service recommendation under big data (2016.01-2019.12). National Natural Science Foundation of China Civil Aviation Joint Fund: Passenger Multimodal Emotion Perception and Analysis Based on Civil Aviation Events (2020.01-2022.12). Key Project of the Scientific Research Program of Tianjin Municipal Education Commission, Research on Keyword Prediction Algorithm Integrating Extraction and Generation (2021ZD002), 2021.12-2023.12. Academic achievements (representative works) Conference Papers [1] Yuxiang Zhang, Tao Jiang, Tianyu Yang, XiaoLi Li, Suge Wang. Awards and Honors Fu Jiamei's master's thesis "Multimodal Affective Analysis Based on Deep Learning" under his guidance was awarded the excellent thesis of Tianjin engineering degree in 2020-2021 In 2009, was rated as a young backbone teacher of Civil Aviation University of China, and in 2012, he was assessed as an excellent young backbone teacher Instruct students to participate in the National Undergraduate Mathematical Modeling Contest: First National Prize (2005: Zhao Dongyue, Gong Xiaojie, Tian Yuanli), Second National Prize (2008: Qi Yujiao, Li Yang, Wu Weiwei; 2019: Lu Ziwei, Wen Gan, Sun Jun) Instructing students to participate in the Mathematical Modeling Contest for American College Students: Meritorious Winner (2006: Hu Yuanyan, Liu Bo, Du Meixiang)
